titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 200 Westport Road in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Nutterville Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/16/2014--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 200 Westport Road in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Nutterville Post Office Building."
